documents.document: The quality of your life is the quality of your relationships. -Tony Robbins
Sudden resolutions, like the sudden rise of mercury in a barometer, indicate little else than the variability of the weather. -David Hare
Nobody really cares if you're miserable, so you might as well be happy. -Cynthia Nelms
What's got badly, goes badly. -Irish proverb
Respect Quotes https://t.co/Fkf5XPbnpC
You can stand tall without standing on someone. You can be a victor without having victims. -Harriet Woods
U have 2 put in many, many, many tiny efforts that nobody sees or appreciates b4 U achieve anything worthwhile. -Brian Tracy
As you walk down the fairway of life you must smell the roses, for you only get to play one round. -Ben Hogan
I just want to leave the world a little better than I found it, and that's my goal in life. -Armand Hammer
He who is afraid of a thing gives it power over him. -Moorish Proverb
People may doubt what you say, but they will believe what you do. -Lewis Cass
It takes the hammer of persistence to drive the nail of success. -John Mason
Criticism Quotes https://t.co/QNx7F2kEjY
It is wise to keep in mind that no success or failure is necessarily final. -Unknown
Get action. Seize the moment. Man was never intended to become an oyster. -Theodore Roosevelt
Patience, persistence and perspiration make an unbeatable combination for success. -Napoleon Hill
Anything you vividly imagine, ardently desire, sincerely believe & enthusiastically act upon must come to reality. -Paul Meyer
Man can only receive what he sees himself receiving. -Florence Scovel Shinn
When you've exhausted all possibilities, remember this: you haven't! -Robert Schuller
Discontented Poem https://t.co/DTfzEILyvw
What great things would you attempt if you knew you could not fail? -Robert Schuller
Possibilitizing is overcoming while you're undergoing. -Robert Schuller
If you limit your actions in life to things that nobody can find fault with, you will not do much. -Charles Dodgson
To find out what one is fitted to do, and to secure an opportunity to do it, is the key to happiness. -John Dewey
The highest reward for man's toil is not what he gets for it, but what he becomes by it. -John Ruskin
Originality and the feeling of one's own dignity are achieved only through work and struggle. -Fyodor Dostoyevsky
Beware of dissipating your powers; strive constantly to concentrate them. -Goethe
Courage Poem https://t.co/aB3Arv3Lpf
Happy are those who dream dreams and are ready to pay the price to make them come true. -L.J. Cardinal Suenens
Nothing of worthy or weight can be achieved with half a mind, with a faint heart, and with a lame endeavor. -Isaac Barrow
Everyone should carefully observe which way his heart draws him, and then choose that way with… https://t.co/xOWOLr9tQZ
Strength is a matter of the made-up mind. -John Beecher
Look for opportunity. You can't wait for it to knock on the door. You might not be home. -Jinger Heath
You create your opportunities by asking for them. -Patty Hansen
Gratitude is a quality similar to electricity: it must be produced and discharged and used up in order to exist at all. -Faulkner
What I Must Do Is All That Concerns Me https://t.co/oILCqsViR0
There is more to life than just existing and having a pleasant time. -Johann Friedrich Von Schiller
It was when I found out I could make mistakes that I knew I was on to something. -Ornette Coleman #quotes
If you don't program yourself, life will program you! -Les Brown
"Talk happiness. The world is sad enough without your woe." -Orison S. Marden
Everyone should carefully observe which way his heart draws him, and then choose that way with all his strength. -Chinese Proverb
If we could learn to like ourselves, even a little, maybe our cruelties and angers might melt away. -John Steinbeck
Another Tack https://t.co/b2oTVg5ZPt
What you are afraid to do is a clear indicator of the next thing you need to do. -Unknown
Those who cannot remember the past are condemned to repeat it. -George Santayana
If you want to achieve excellence, you can get there today. As of this second, quit doing less-than-excellent work. -Thomas Watson
You will never be the person you can be if pressure, tension and discipline are taken out of… https://t.co/CMP67Yoqus
Worry does not empty tomorrow of its sorrow; it empties today of its strength. -Corrie Ten Boom
The golden rule for every business man is this: Put yourself in your customer's place. -Orison Swett Marden
The basis of accomplishment is in never quitting. -Mengzi Meng-tse
It is by attempting to reach the top in a single leap that so much misery is produced in the world. -William Cobbett
Tempest-Tossed Souls https://t.co/za7lowiovJ
Immense power is acquired by assuring yourself in your secret reveries that you were born to control affairs. -Andrew Carnegie
From success you get a lot of things, but not that great inside thing that love brings you. -Samuel Goldwyn
Keep in mind that the true measure of an individual is how he treats a person who can do him absolutely no good. -E Friedman
We don't grow unless we take risks. Any successful company is riddled with failures. -James E. Burke
"We know nothing about motivation. All we can do is write books about it." -Peter F Drucker
Though ambition in itself is a vice, it often is also the parent of virtue. -Edgar Quinet #quotes
The Better or the Good https://t.co/MogTdOvjh0
Don't be humble, you're not that great. -Golda Meir
Use what talents you possess; the woods would be very silent if no birds sang there except those that sang best. -Henry van Dyke
No thoroughly occupied man was ever yet very miserable. -Letitia Elizabeth Landon
It is with trifles and when he is off guard that a man best reveals his character. -Arthur Schopenhauer
"A nail is driven out by another nail; habit is overcome by habit." -Desiderius Erasmus
If hard work were such a wonderful thing, surely the rich would have kept it all to themselves. -Lane Kirkland
"Efficiency is doing things right; effectiveness is doing the right things." -Peter Drucker
Cast of Characters https://t.co/1eFs1GQ0EM
"God uses suffering as a whetstone, to make men sharp with." -Henry Ward Beecher #quotes
To design the future effectively, you must first let go of your past. -Charles J. Givens
Seize the day. -Horace
Act boldly and unseen forces will come to your aid. -Dorothea Brande
Pick battles big enough to matter, but small enough to win. -Jonathan Kozol
Every man has in himself a continent of undiscovered character. Happy is he who acts as the Columbus to his own soul. -Sir J. Stephen
Live Your Life Like You Climb A Mountain https://t.co/HHBjQrQCIu
Forget mistakes. Forget failure. Forget everything except what you're going to do now & do it. Today is your lucky day. -Will Durant
Goals are the fuel in the furnace of achievement. -Brian Tracy
"Keep your fears to yourself, but share your inspiration with others." -Robert Louis Stevenson
Rather see the wonders of the world abroad, than, living dully sluggardized @ home, wear out thy youth w/ shapeless idleness. -Shakespeare
To err is human, but when the eraser wears out ahead of the pencil, you're overdoing it. -Josh Jenkins
By working faithfully eight hours a day, you may eventually get to be a boss and work twelve hours a day. -Robert Frost
"The man who does not read good books has no advantage over the man who cannot read them." -Mark Twain
Read, If You Want To Be Interesting https://t.co/tDDHglQma4
If you haven't the strength to impose your own terms upon life, you must accept the terms it offers you. -T.S. Eliot
Those whose work and pleasures are one are fortune's favorite children. -Winston Churchill
A person without a sense of humor is like a wagon without springs. It's jolted by every pebble on the road. -Henry Ward Beecher
When it is obvious that the goals cannot be reached, don't adjust the goals, adjust the action steps. -Confucius #quotes
Every job is a self-portrait of the person who did it. Autograph your work with excellence. -Unknown
You never miss the water till the well runs dry. -English Proverb
Iron-Will Determination https://t.co/ggfqn7Rhjq
If you don't have confidence, you'll always find a way not to win. -Carl Lewis
I believe you are your work. Don't trade the stuff of your life, time, for nothing more than dollars. That's a rotten bargain. -Rita Brown
Opinion is the medium between knowledge and ignorance. -Plato
I've found luck is quite predictable. If u want more luck, take more chances. B more active. Show up more often. -Brian Tracy
We consume our tomorrows fretting about our yesterdays. -Persius #quotes
There can be no friendship without confidence, and no confidence without integrity. -Samuel Johnson
If a man could have half of his wishes, he would double his troubles. -Benjamin Franklin
Hope is the companion of power, and mother of success; for who so hopes strongly has within him the gift of miracles. -S Smiles
A slander is like a hornet; if you cannot kill it dead the first blow, better not strike at it. -Josh Billings
There is no such thing as bravery; only degrees of fear. -John Wainwright
Enthusiasm is the greatest asset in the world. It beats money, power and influence. -Henry Chester
